import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core';
import { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms';
import { Router } from '@angular/router';
import { TokenService } from 'src/app/services/token.service';
import { UserService } from 'src/app/services/user.service';
import Swal from 'sweetalert2';

@Component({
  selector: 'app-signin',
  templateUrl: './sign-in.component.html',
  styleUrls: ['./sign-in.component.scss']
})
export class SignInComponent implements OnInit{

  constructor(private formBuilder: FormBuilder, private userService: UserService, private router: Router, private tokenService: TokenService) { }
  public signInForm: FormGroup;

  ngOnInit(): void {
    this.createForm();
    if (this.tokenService.getToken() != null) {
      this.signInForm.reset();
      this.router.navigateByUrl('/anime');
    }
  }

  createForm() {
    this.signInForm = this.formBuilder.group({
      username: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.minLength(6)]],
      password: ['', [Validators.required]]

    })
  }
  get username() {
    return this.signInForm.get('username')
  }

  get password() {
    return this.signInForm.get('password')
  }

  validationMessages = {
    'username': [
      { type: 'required', message: 'Please enter your username.' },
    ],
    'password': [
      { type: 'required', message: 'Please enter your password.' },
    ]

  }

  signIn() {
    if (this.signInForm.invalid) return
    const data = this.signInForm.value;

    this.userService.signIn(data).subscribe(resp => {
      localStorage.setItem('token', resp.token);
      localStorage.setItem('user', resp.user._id);
      Swal.fire({
        title: 'Welcome to Ohayō!.',
        width: 600,
        padding: '3em',
        background: '#fff'
      })

      this.router.navigateByUrl("/home")
    }, error => {
      Swal.fire(
        error.message,
        'error'
      )
    });
  }
}
<html>
<body>
	<div class="container h-100">
		<div class="d-flex justify-content-center h-100">
			<div class="user_card">
				<div class="d-flex justify-content-center">
					<div class="brand_logo_container">
						<img src="../../../assets/axolotl.png" class="brand_logo" alt="Logo">
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="d-flex justify-content-center form_container">
					<form [formGroup]="signInForm" (ngSubmit)="signIn()">
						<div class="input-group mb-5">
							<div class="input-group-append">
								<span class="input-group-text"><i class="fas fa-user"></i></span>
							</div>
							<input type="text" formControlName="username" class="form-control input_user" value="" placeholder="Username">
						</div>
						<div *ngFor="let error of validationMessages.username">
                            <ng-container *ngIf="username.hasError(error.type) && username.touched">
                                <small class="errorMessage">{{error.message}}</small>
                            </ng-container>
                        </div>
						<div class="input-group mb-5">
							<div class="input-group-append">
								<span class="input-group-text"><i class="fas fa-key"></i></span>
							</div>
							<input type="password" formControlName="password" class="form-control input_pass" value="" placeholder="Password">
						</div>
						<div *ngFor="let error of validationMessages.password">
                            <ng-container *ngIf="password.hasError(error.type) && password.touched">
                                <small class="errorMessage">{{error.message}}</small>
                            </ng-container>
                        </div>
							<div class="d-flex justify-content-center mt-3 login_container">
				 	<button type="submit" name="button" class="btn login_btn">Sign In</button>
				   </div>
					</form>
				</div>
		
				<div class="mt-3 mb-3">
					<div class="d-flex justify-content-center links">
						Don't have an account? <a routerLink="/signup" class=" signin ml-2">Sign Up</a>
					</div>
					<div class="d-flex justify-content-center links">
						Don't want to join us? <a routerLink="/anime" class=" signin ml-2">Enter without credentials</a>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</body>
</html>
